db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:listitem.db:para: CalendarStyle is part of Styling Controls

db:section.db:title: Component Map
db:section.db:para: The calendar has the following styleable components:

db:td.db:para: One instance per day of week.
One instance per day of month.

db:section.db:title: Custom Style Example
background : Component
db:section.db:para: The implicit size of the calendar is calculated based on the implicit size of the background delegate.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] control : Calendar
db:section.db:para: The Calendar this style is attached to.

db:section.db:title: dayDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: The delegate that styles each date in the calendar.
The properties provided to each delegate are:

db:td.db:para: true if this is the selected date.
true if this date is greater than or equal to than minimumDate and less than or equal to maximumDate.
true if this date is equal to today's date.
true if the month in this date is the visible month.
true if the mouse is over this cell.

db:note.db:para: This property is true even when the mouse is hovered over an invalid date.

db:td.db:para: true if the mouse is pressed on this cell.

db:note.db:para: This property is true even when the mouse is pressed on an invalid date.

db:section.db:title: dayOfWeekDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: The delegate that styles each weekday.
The height of the weekday row is calculated based on the maximum implicit height of the delegates.
The properties provided to each delegate are:

db:td.db:para: The day of the week this delegate represents. Possible values:

db:section.db:title: gridColor : color
db:section.db:para: The color of the grid lines.

db:section.db:title: gridVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines the visibility of the grid.

db:section.db:title: navigationBar : Component
db:section.db:para: The navigation bar of the calendar.
Styles the bar at the top of the calendar that contains the next month/previous month buttons and the selected date label.
The properties provided to the delegate are:

db:section.db:title: padding group
db:section.db:para: This grouped property holds the top, left, right and bottom padding.

db:section.db:title: weekNumberDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: The delegate that styles each week number.
The width of the week number column is calculated based on the maximum implicit width of the delegates.
The properties provided to each delegate are:

db:td.db:para: The number of the week this delegate represents.
